decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing creatures like Nomads en-Kor and Springheart Nantuko to create infinite loops and generate massive amounts of mana with Gaea's Cradle. By tutoring for key pieces with cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Chord of Calling, the deck can quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game. The inclusion of cards like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Endurance provide additional ways to close out the game or disrupt opponent's strategies. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its explosive combos and efficient mana generation.

The deck focuses on utilizing Life from the Loam to repeatedly dredge lands back into hand, while using cards like Wasteland and Urza's Saga to control the board. It also has a strong toolbox element with creatures like Wight of the Reliquary and Elvish Reclaimer to find specific lands when needed. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's resources with land destruction, while building up its own board presence and potentially overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures like Iridescent Vinelasher and Springheart Nantuko.

This Goblin aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying and buffing up Goblin creatures to overwhelm opponents with sheer numbers and damage output. By utilizing powerful Goblin cards like Muxus, Goblin Grandee and Goblin Warchief, this deck can quickly flood the board with threats while also having access to disruption and removal spells like Pyrokinesis and Warren Weirding to keep the opponent on the back foot. With a mix of aggressive creatures, disruption, and card advantage engines, this deck aims to close out games quickly with relentless pressure.

The main focus of this deck is to combine the abilities of Nomads en-Kor and Nadu, Winged Wisdom to create a powerful combo that allows for card draw and creature removal. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Force of Will to protect the combo. Green Sun's Zenith is used to tutor for key creatures like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath for value and Endurance for graveyard hate. Overall, the deck aims to control the game while setting up the combo for a lethal finish.

The deck revolves around setting up a winning combo using Doomsday to stack the top of the library with a specific sequence of cards that will result in victory. The deck includes various cards to draw, control the board, and protect the combo, such as Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, Force of Will, and Daze. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo pieces while disrupting the opponent's strategy and ensuring a quick and decisive win. The deck's efficient card selection and manipulation tools make it a formidable force in Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of creatures and removal spells to control the board. It utilizes cards like Swords to Plowshares and Static Prison to handle opponent threats while deploying efficient creatures like Knight-Errant of Eos and Gravecrawler to apply pressure. The deck also has some utility with cards like Spymaster's Vault and Chthonian Nightmare, providing card advantage and disruption. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and includes key lands like Karakas and Wasteland to disrupt opponent strategies.

The deck revolves around assembling the Cephalid Breakfast combo of Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to mill your library, using Dread Return to reanimate Thassa's Oracle for the win. The deck also includes protection in the form of Force of Will and Teferi, Time Raveler, as well as disruption with Cabal Therapy and Swords to Plowshares. Urza's Saga helps to find combo pieces, while Brainstorm and Ponder provide card selection. The goal is to assemble the combo quickly and protect it long enough to win the game.
